sentences.en: A growing number of employers are trying to bypass the unions altogether.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的雇主试图完全绕过工会行事。

sentences.en: A new bypass around the city is being built.
sentences.cn: 一条新的绕城环路正在建设当中。

sentences.en: Arrangements were well advanced for linking up this newly operated length with the Lancaster bypass.
sentences.cn: 已经提前做出安排使新投入使用的这段高速公路与兰开斯特支线衔接.

sentences.en: Francis bypassed his manager and wrote straight to the director.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西斯绕过他的经理，直接写信给董事。

sentences.en: If we take the bypass we'll avoid the town centre.
sentences.cn: 我们走旁道就能绕过镇中心.

sentences.en: Interstate 8 bypasses the town to the north.
sentences.cn: 八号州际公路绕城向北而行。
我们绕过这座小镇子 吧!

sentences.en: The bypass relieves traffic jams in our city centre.
sentences.cn: 这条旁道缓解了我们城市中心的交通阻塞情况.

sentences.en: The latter may be used with bypass or throttling valves in the tower water pipework circuit.
sentences.cn: 近来,可采用在冷却塔的水管系统中设置旁通阀或节流阀.

sentences.en: They could, in essence, bypass the use of the menu entirely.
sentences.cn: 基本上, 他们可以完全避开菜单的使用.

sentences.en: This structure connects the Hamburg Tree Port area with a western motorway bypass.
sentences.cn: 这座桥连接了汉堡自由港区与西部南速干道的支线.

sentences.en: Three of my veins had furred up and I needed a triple bypass.
sentences.cn: 我有三条静脉出现了堵塞，需要做个三支搭桥手术。

sentences.en: We took the bypass to avoid the town centre.
sentences.cn: 我们走旁边的道路绕开市中心.

sentences.en: We'd better take the bypass to avoid the traffic in the centre of town.
sentences.cn: 我们最好避开市中心车辆而走旁道.

phrases.tran_cn: 绕道手术；心脏搭桥手术
旁通阀；旁通活门；防通阀
冠状动脉旁路；冠状动脉绕道手术；冠状动脉分流术
冠状动脉旁路手术；冠状动脉架桥术

trans.tran_cn: （绕过城市的）旁道，（心脏）分流术
trans.tran_en: a tube that allows gas or liquid to flow around something rather than through it
to go around a town or other busy place rather than through it

trans.tran_cn: 绕过， 绕…走； 越过， 置…于不顾
trans.tran_en: to avoid obeying a rule, system, or someone in an official position
